H0.text: Second is a type of messenger that the calcium ion exemplifies.

H1.text: Third messenger is the kind of messenger exemplified by the calcium ion.

H2.text: Fourth is the kind of messenger that a calcium ion is an example of.

H3.text: First is a type of messenger exemplified by the calcium ion.

A4.text: Calcium ions are one type of second messengers.

A5.text: The ions are normally bound or stored in intracellular components (such as the endoplasmic reticulum(ER)) and can be released during signal transduction.
